content.description: Crux is getting off the ground and the route gets easier the higher you go.
content.protection: 4 bolts and no anchor, you can traverse left to the two bolt anchor atop War on Errorism to rap off.
content.location: This is the third route from the left on the short wall that borders the west side of the campsite.

content.description: Crux is pulling off the ground and the route gets easier the higher you get.  You may want to stick clip the second bolt since the first bolt hanger is an old rusty relic.
content.protection: 4 bolts to two bolt anchor with normal hangers.
content.location: This is the second route from the left on the short wall bordering  the west side of the campsite.

content.description: This route climbs through pockets and sharp holds up a wall that gets less steep the higher you go.  Crux is probably between the first and second bolts.
content.protection: 4 bolts, but there are no anchors at the top of the route.  I traversed over to the anchors atop "War on Errorism" which are just two widely spaced bolts with normal hangers and rapped from there.
content.location: This is the left most route on the short wall bordering the west side of the campsite.

content.description: Climb pockets and tuffas to a 2 bolt rappel above the ledge.
content.location: Located on west side of canyon behind a huge cedar tree that grows sideways.
